data.title: Around the World with Kipling by Rudyard KIPLING
data.meta_description: Garden City, New York: Doubleday, Page & Company, 1926.  Hardcover. Very Good.  The Mandalay edition of the Works of Rudyard Kipling. Brown cloth with Kipling's initials embossed on front board, printed spine label, top edge gilt. Endpapersâ€¦
data.text: All books are first editions unless otherwise noted. All books are returnable within ten days if returned in the same condition as sent. We accept VISA, MASTERCARD, AMERICAN EXPRESS, DISCOVER, PAYPAL, checks and money orders. New Jersey residents please add 6.625% sales tax. All items guaranteed, all items subject to prior sale. Members ABAA, ILAB. Shipping is $4.50 for Media Mail, $10.00 for Priority Mail or UPS Ground. Tracking is provided for every order. Alternate shipping available by request. Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required.
